name: fig
description: Fig adds IDE-style autocomplete to your existing terminal. Move faster with Fig.

name: alfred
description: Alfred is an award-winning app for macOS which boosts your efficiency with hotkeys, keywords, text expansion and more.

name: displaperture
description: Displaperture lets you round the corners of your display by an amount you define—anything from a subtle hint of rounding to a full-on oval, it's under your control.

name: libreoffice
description: LibreOffice is a free and powerful office suite, and a successor to OpenOffice.org (commonly known as OpenOffice). Its clean interface and feature-rich tools help you unleash your creativity and enhance your productivity.

name: macs-fan-control
description: Monitor and control your computer's fans.

name: spectacle
description: Move and resize windows with ease.

name: rectangle
description: Move and resize windows in macOS using keyboard shortcuts or snap areas.

name: authy
description: Enable 2FA for your favorite sites. Go beyond the password and protect yourself from hackers and account takeovers.

name: meetingbar
description: Your meetings before your eyes! MeetingBar shows your calendar events in the status bar. Create and join meetings in one click.

name: monitorcontrol
description: Controls your external display brightness and volume and shows native OSD. Use menulet sliders or the keyboard, including native Apple keys!

name: amethyst
description: A tiling window manager for macOS.

name: sloth
description: Sloth is a native Mac app that shows all open files, directories, sockets, pipes, and devices in use by all running processes on your system. This makes it easy to inspect which apps are using which files, etc.

name: lyricsx
description: Ultimate lyrics app for macOS.

name: hush
description: Block nags to accept cookies and privacy invasive tracking in Safari.

name: colorsnapper
description: The color picker for Mac that makes it easy to inspect, adjust, organize, and export precise color values of any pixel on the screen.

name: raycast
description: Raycast is a blazingly fast, totally extendable launcher. It lets you complete tasks, calculate, share common links, and much more.

name: betterdisplay
description: Custom Resolutions, XDR/HDR Extra Brightness, Brightness Adjustment, Dummy Displays, Picture in Picture, Display Overrides - a macOS menubar app.

name: 1password
description: Password manager that keeps all passwords secure behind one password

name: macfuse
description: File system integratio

name: ngrok
description: Reverse proxy, secure introspectable tunnels to localhost

name: keycastr
description: Open-source keystroke visualizer

name: anydesk
description: Remote desktop software

name: shottr
description: Screenshot tool

name: warp
description: Rust-based terminal

name: karabiner-elements
description: Keyboard customizer

name: iina
description: Free and open-source media player

name: insomnia
description: API client

name: maccy
description: Clipboard manager

name: hiddenbar

name: itsycal
description: Itsycal is a tiny menu bar calendar.

name: alt-tab
description: AltTab brings the power of Windows alt-tab to macOS

name: runjs
description: JavaScript playground that auto-evaluates as code is typed

name: linear-linear
description: Meet the new standard for modern software development. Streamline issues, sprints, and product roadmaps.

name: background-music
description: Background Music automatically pauses your music player when a second audio source is playing and unpauses the player when the second source has stopped.

name: bitwarden
description: Open source password management solutions for individuals, teams, and business organizations.

name: flameshot
description: Powerful, yet simple to use open-source screenshot software.

name: the-unarchiver
description: The Unarchiver is the only app you need to open RAR on Mac. It’s times more powerful than the native macOS utility and supports infinitely more archive formats.

name: dozer
description: Hide menu bar icons to give your Mac a cleaner look.

name: unnaturalscrollwheels
description: Invert scroll direction for physical scroll wheels while maintaining 'Natural' scrolling for trackpads on MacOS.

name: mos
description: A lightweight tool used to smooth scrolling and set scroll direction independently for your mouse on MacOS

name: keepingyouawake
description: Tool to prevent the system from going into sleep mode.

name: linearmouse
description: Customize mouse behavior

name: notunes
description: noTunes is a macOS application that will prevent iTunes or Apple Music from launching. Simply launch the noTunes app and iTunes/Music will no longer be able to launch. For example, when bluetooth headphones reconnect.

name: syntax-highlight
description: The application offers a Quick Look Extension for macOS 10.15 Catalina and later for previewing source files. Inside it uses Highlight to render source code with syntax highlighting.

name: kap
description: An open-source screen recorder built with web technology

name: bluesnooze
description: Bluesnooze prevents your sleeping Mac from connecting to Bluetooth accessories.

name: todoist
description: Todoist is a task management app that helps you get organized and be more productive.

name: middleclick
description: Emulate a scroll wheel click with three finger Click or Tap on MacBook trackpad and Magic Mouse

name: gas-mask
description: Gas Mask is a simple hosts file manager for macOS. It allows editing of host files and switching between them.

name: lunar
description: Intelligent adaptive brightness for your external monitors.

name: obsidian
description: Obsidian is a powerful and extensible knowledge base that works on top of your local folder of plain text files.

name: notion
description: One workspace. Every team. We’re more than a doc. Or a table. Customize Notion to work the way you do.

name: agenda
description: Agenda is a date-focused note taking app for both planning and documenting your projects.

name: lightshot
description: Lightshot is a free program that offers a quick and easy way to capture a screen including basic editing tools.

name: hot
description: Hot is macOS menu bar application that displays the CPU speed limit due to thermal issues.

name: tiles
